name: Roll Over Princess
description:
★The English version will be released soon!★

Collect materials scattered throughout the tower and aim for the top floor while crafting equipment. The rare and powerful items called "Legacies" that occasionally drop can significantly boost your power through careful selection!

Upon clearing the 20th floor, you can perform alchemy on defeated enemies. They will then serve as reliable allies known as "Guards"!

Knowledge Points, gathered through repeated play, become a crucial guide for conquering the game. Unlock various elixirs to gain an advantage in your strategy!
Discover unexpected combinations to create the ultimate build in your hands!

★There are also abundant post-clear challenges!★
Estimated First Clear Time: 50 hours or more

◆Materials and Alchemy◆

Obtain various materials scattered throughout the tower and recipes for ancient alchemical methods to create equipment and items.

Recipes range from basic to rare and legendary items!
Aim for the best materials and transmutations, leveling up along the way!

◆Recruit Enemies as Allies◆

Upon clearing the 20th floor, defeated enemies will drop magical cores called "Magic Core." By transmuting them in the alchemical cauldron, you can recruit them as allies.

From formidable foes to area bosses and even tougher enemies, all can drop Magic Core and join your party. Build your strongest team and become unstoppable!

◆Legacy of the Mythical Era◆

Within the tower lies remnants of the mythical era - items known as "Legacies."
Choose one from several options and enhance your abilities. Some conceal powerful forces...

◆Knowledge and Elixirs◆

Even if you falter midway, you gain "Knowledge Points" along with your achievements.
Gather Knowledge Points and use them to employ "Elixirs," advancing through the journey with an advantage. With each new area cleared, more potent elixirs are unlocked.
